quotesystem.add.offline.message: Only moderators may add quotes when the stream is offline.

quotesystem.add.success.message: Added new quote from $1 with id #$2.

quotesystem.del.404.message: Could not delete quote $1... Are you sure it exists?

quotesystem.del.success.message: Deleted quote $1. There are $2 quotes now.

quotesystem.edit.404.message: Could not find quote $1... Are you sure it exists?

quotesystem.get.404.message: Could not find quote $1... Are you sure it exists?

quotesystem.quotemessage.success.message: Changed the message used for quotes.

quotesystem.twitchnames-disabled.message: Usernames for quotes won't be validated

quotesystem.twitchnames-enabled.message: Usernames for quotes will validated against users who have been in chat.
